text: Hey developers! Is there anyone here who works with git and github and pushes their code to github and thereby to HubSpot? Does anyone have a solution how to see your work before the push? Do you use the watch function?

I use environment-specific branches to push code to HubSpot; `develop` branch code going to my personal HS development sandbox, `staging` going to the client's enterprise sandbox, `production` going to their production HS account. These are hooked in with GitHub Actions to run scripts that bundle and publish the theme's `dist` folder to the correct environment.
`dist` being output from the bundling of all code/styles/assets.
